short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let'sTalkSign PDF Interpreter extension summarizes contents of PDF's (Online only for now) in Sign Language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let'sTalkSign PDF Interpreter extension is designed to make any PDF content accessible in Sign Language for the Deaf,  Hard-of-Hearing and Speech Impaired Communities. Currently, it supports Indian Sign Language (ISL).

Key Features:
1. PDF content Summarization: Lets users quickly grasp the essence of PDFs by condensing them into concise summaries in Indian Sign Language (ISL).

2. Questions and Answers regarding PDF content: Provides important questions and their corresponding answers in Indian Sign Language, facilitating deeper engagement with the content.

3. Download Option: Allows users to effortlessly download PDF summaries as text files for offline viewing, ensuring accessibility anytime, anywhere.

Coming Soon:
Let'sTalkSign PDF Interpreter extension will be adding support for additional Sign Languages like American Sign Language, British Sign Language, etc. in the future.
